channel.title: Pages on Maksym Prokopov personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Maksym Prokopov personal blog

item.title: Read
item.description:
My interests currently lie in the following categories:

  • Psyhology, self-improvement and mental health
  • Domain Driven Design
  • Lean production, lean services
  • SRE and DevOps

Here is my confession to the one of the greatest books about computer science:

Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software

if you are a computer science enthusiast, this is must read!

Стейнбек говорил, что «плохой роман должен развлекать читателей, средний – воздействовать на их чувства, а лучший – озарять им путь»

item.title: Talks
item.description:
Knowledge Sharing

I love sharing a knowledge. This helps to build better and secure present and future for everyone.

  • Devs MeetUp: Trunk Based Development, Freiburg 2024
  • Steel Drum: Modern Digital Telephony Asterisk, Lviv 2017
  • Ruby Meetup: Using Pry For Debugging Rails Appliction, Kyiv 2016
  • ITSM Days: SLA and Service Management Best Practices, Kyiv 2015
  • V Habr Meetup: Service Constant Improvement, Kyiv 2015
  • Business Club Meetup: Why Business Owners should care of IT, Kyiv 2014
  • Clojure Workshop: Build Clojure Application from scratch: parsing a web site to the structure, Kyiv 2014

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, my name is Maksym Prokopov. I love technology. That’s my passion and what I do on my daily job and beyond.

Before I got my first computer Intel 386 DX 40 in 1994, I used to write small programs using MK61 programmable calculator, then a bit of soviet Corvette computer programming when I attended 6-7 class. Since then my journey didn’t end and I was in love with the software engineering.
